HEADERS.INDEX_SEO_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Plasticos Especiales Garen SA de CV
HEADERS.ABOUT_SEO_DESCRIPTION: We are a proudly Mexican company committed to providing quality products at fair prices.

FOOTER.CERTIFICATION_TEXT_3: Plásticos Especiales GAREN S.A. de C.V.

INDEX.TEXT_1: We manufacture and distribute CELL CAST Acrylic sheets, Polycarbonate Sheets, Polystyrene, Corrugated Pipe for electrical installations and Polypropylene Piping for water conduction, as well as Foamed PVC Sheets.
INDEX.TEXT_2: Our commitment is with you, in order to provide you the highest quality products, for this reason we invest in two lines of extrusion of cellular sheet and corrugated sheet of last generation polycarbonate.

PRODUCTS_INDEX.TITLE: Products
PRODUCTS_INDEX.SUBTITLE_TEXT_1: WE HAVE 28 BRANCHES OFFICES THROUGHOUT THE MEXICAN REPUBLIC

ABOUT.SLOGAN: We are a proudly Mexican company committed to providing quality products at fair prices.

MISSION.TITLE: MISSION
MISSION.CONTENT: Provide our customers with the highest quality products in plastics for construction and decoration, innovating our processes and products in order to meet their needs.

VISION.TITLE: VISION
VISION.CONTENT: To be a leader in the manufacture and distribution of plastics in Mexico, developing products in a timely manner according to the needs of our market and venturing into Latin American countries.
